author: Marwan Bishara
title: The world is united on Ukraine, divided on America
description: As Cold War II rises on the horizon, the world is wary of taking sides.
content: In terms of a Cold War you have the vast majority of the rest of the world in total opposition to what [Putin] is doing Its going to be a cold day for Russia, observed US President Joe Biden at a Feb… [+6371 chars]
